summary: Insert the effects of potions or poisons into a spells using this mod.
descriptionHtml:
Custom Spell from Potions

This mod is currently being tested, but feel free to try it! Just back-up your save(s), okay?

This mod allows you to take the effects of a potion (or poison) and insert them into either aimed or self-oriented spells.

Requires SKSE, and the latest version at that. Older versions may or may not work.

How to Use:

Step 1: Use the Alteration spell called "Submit Spell Potion". Place a single potion or poison into the magic container

when the inventory trade menu opens.

Step 2: Use either the spell "Create Aimed Spell" or "Create Self Spell". They're both Alteration spells. Both will give

you a feedback message box. Note that it will also now ask you for a spell slot. See below for more details on that.

Step 3: Use your custom spell! (See below...)

===New Features===

Spell slots...you have five aimed spell slots and five self spell slots, for a total of up to ten custom spells. All of the

spells are pre-added to your character, but will have empty, generic effects until overwritten.

Oh, and now the spells are created in a "non-hostile mode" when the submitted item was a potion and not a poison.
author: DumdogsWorld
